content.html: Four tricks that make Twitter useful for learning: 🔎Find top tweets by search: “from:[username] min_faves:[number]” 📚Use allmytweets.net/connect/ to create a archive of tweets you made/liked 🔍Search your followers: “filter:follows [term] 🐦Use Twemex (twemex.app)
content.value:
Four tricks that make Twitter useful for learning: 
🔎Find top tweets by search:
“from:[username] min_faves:[number]”
📚Use allmytweets.net/connect/ to create a archive of tweets you made/liked
🔍Search your followers: “filter:follows [term]
🐦Use Twemex (twemex.app)
